}
list
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result); var og = (selector) => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content')); var book = { name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|免费|最新章节).*|（.*）/,''), author: og('novel:author'), kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/,''), latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*[】）\)]/,'').replace(/^(正文)?(\s+|_)/,''), cover: og('image'), intro: '
最后更新：' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/\s.*/,'') + ' \n' + '———————————\n' + String(J.select('#intro p').html()).replace(/.*简介：|各位书友.*/,'').replace(/\s+/g,'
'), url: baseUrl+'catalog/', }; book;
ruleBookInfo.name: name
ruleBookInfo.author: author

ruleContent.content:
<js>
a=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result).match(/id="content">([\s\S]*?)\s<\/div>/)[1]).html();
//取屏蔽段落
var content=String(result.match(/function\s*getDecode\(\)\{(.*)\}/)[1]);
//还原屏蔽段落
content=content.replace(/\\/g,"/")
.replace(/[A-Z]=~.*?\('/g,"")
.replace(/#.*?\('/g,"")
.replace(/'\).*/g,"")
.replace(/\+|"/g,"")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__\$/g,"9")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$___/g,"8")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$\$/g,"7")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$_/g,"6")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$_\$/g,"5")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__/g,"4")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$\$/g,"3")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$_/g,"2")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.__\$/g,"1")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.___/g,"0")
.replace(/\/\/74\/{2,3}160\/\/76/g,"\n")
//大写字母
.replace(/\/\/132/g,"Z")
.replace(/\/\/131/g,"Y")
.replace(/\/\/130/g,"X")
.replace(/\/\/127/g,"W")
.replace(/\/\/126/g,"V")
.replace(/\/\/125/g,"U")
.replace(/\/\/124/g,"T")
.replace(/\/\/123/g,"S")
.replace(/\/\/122/g,"R")
.replace(/\/\/121/g,"Q")
.replace(/\/\/120/g,"P")
.replace(/\/\/117/g,"O")
.replace(/\/\/116/g,"N")
.replace(/\/\/115/g,"M")
.replace(/\/\/114/g,"L")
.replace(/\/\/113/g,"K")
.replace(/\/\/112/g,"J")
.replace(/\/\/111/g,"I")
.replace(/\/\/110/g,"H")
.replace(/\/\/107/g,"G")
.replace(/\/\/106/g,"F")
.replace(/\/\/105/g,"E")
.replace(/\/\/104/g,"D")
.replace(/\/\/103/g,"C")
.replace(/\/\/102/g,"B")
.replace(/\/\/101/g,"A")
.replace(/\/\/100/g,"@")
//小写字母
.replace(/5\_​/g,"a")
.replace(/5\$/g,"b")
.replace(/6\_​/g,"c")
.replace(/6\$/g,"d")
.replace(/7\_​/g,"e")
.replace(/7\$/g,"f")
.replace(/\/\/147/g,"g")
.replace(/\/\/150/g,"h")
.replace(/\/\/151/g,"i")
.replace(/\/\/152/g,"j")
.replace(/\/\/153/g,"k")
.replace(/\(\!\[\]\)\[2\]/g,"l")
.replace(/\/\/155/g,"m")
.replace(/\/\/156/g,"n")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$/g,"o")
.replace(/\/\/160/g,"p")
.replace(/\/\/161/g,"q")
.replace(/\/\/162/g,"r")
.replace(/\/\/163/g,"s")
.replace(/[A-Z].__/g,"t")
.replace(/[A-Z]._/g,"u")
.replace(/\/\/166/g,"v")
.replace(/\/\/167/g,"w")
.replace(/\/\/170/g,"x")
.replace(/\/\/171/g,"y")
.replace(/\/\/172/g,"z")
//英文符号
.replace(/\/\/72/g,":")
.replace(/\/\/73/g," ")
.replace(/\/\/77/g,"?")
.replace(/\/\/\/\/u(.{4})/g,"%u$1");
密文=unescape(content)
//放回原位
result=String(a);
result=result.replace(/自动加载/,密文)
//分隔符
.replace(/防采集/g,"︵")
.replace(/失败.*?浏览器！/g,"︶")
</js>

<js>
//取正文
a=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result).match(/id="[A-Z].*?">([\s\S]*?)\s<\/div>/)[1]).html();
//取屏蔽段落
var content=String(result.match(/function\s*getDecode\(\)\{(.*)\}/)[1]);
//还原屏蔽段落
content=content.replace(/\\/g,"/")
.replace(/[A-Z]=~.*?\('/g,"")
.replace(/#.*?\('/g,"")
.replace(/'\).*/g,"")
.replace(/\+|"/g,"")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__\$/g,"9")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$___/g,"8")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$\$/g,"7")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$_/g,"6")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$_\$/g,"5")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__/g,"4")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$\$/g,"3")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$_/g,"2")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.__\$/g,"1")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.___/g,"0")
.replace(/\/\/74\/{2,3}160\/\/76/g,"\n")
//大写字母
.replace(/\/\/132/g,"Z")
.replace(/\/\/131/g,"Y")
.replace(/\/\/130/g,"X")
.replace(/\/\/127/g,"W")
.replace(/\/\/126/g,"V")
.replace(/\/\/125/g,"U")
.replace(/\/\/124/g,"T")
.replace(/\/\/123/g,"S")
.replace(/\/\/122/g,"R")
.replace(/\/\/121/g,"Q")
.replace(/\/\/120/g,"P")
.replace(/\/\/117/g,"O")
.replace(/\/\/116/g,"N")
.replace(/\/\/115/g,"M")
.replace(/\/\/114/g,"L")
.replace(/\/\/113/g,"K")
.replace(/\/\/112/g,"J")
.replace(/\/\/111/g,"I")
.replace(/\/\/110/g,"H")
.replace(/\/\/107/g,"G")
.replace(/\/\/106/g,"F")
.replace(/\/\/105/g,"E")
.replace(/\/\/104/g,"D")
.replace(/\/\/103/g,"C")
.replace(/\/\/102/g,"B")
.replace(/\/\/101/g,"A")
.replace(/\/\/100/g,"@")
//小写字母
.replace(/5\_​/g,"a")
.replace(/5\$/g,"b")
.replace(/6\_​/g,"c")
.replace(/6\$/g,"d")
.replace(/7\_​/g,"e")
.replace(/7\$/g,"f")
.replace(/\/\/147/g,"g")
.replace(/\/\/150/g,"h")
.replace(/\/\/151/g,"i")
.replace(/\/\/152/g,"j")
.replace(/\/\/153/g,"k")
.replace(/\(\!\[\]\)\[2\]/g,"l")
.replace(/\/\/155/g,"m")
.replace(/\/\/156/g,"n")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$/g,"o")
.replace(/\/\/160/g,"p")
.replace(/\/\/161/g,"q")
.replace(/\/\/162/g,"r")
.replace(/\/\/163/g,"s")
.replace(/[A-Z].__/g,"t")
.replace(/[A-Z]._/g,"u")
.replace(/\/\/166/g,"v")
.replace(/\/\/167/g,"w")
.replace(/\/\/170/g,"x")
.replace(/\/\/171/g,"y")
.replace(/\/\/172/g,"z")
//英文符号
.replace(/\/\/72/g,":")
.replace(/\/\/73/g," ")
.replace(/\/\/77/g,"?")
.replace(/\/\/\/\/u(.{4})/g,"%u$1");
密文=unescape(content)
//放回原位
result=String(a);
result=result.replace(/自动加载/,密文)
//分隔符
.replace(/防采集/g,"")
.replace(/失败.*?浏览器！/g,"")
</js>

ruleSearch.name: name
ruleSearch.author: author

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);

var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text())

var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));

var book = {
      name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|免费阅读|最新章节).*|（.*）/,''),

      author: og('novel:author'),

      kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/,''),

      wordCount: o('.layui-bg-red').replace(/\s+万字/,'万'),

      latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/,''), 

      intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/,' ').replace(/\//g,'-') + '\n' + o('.intro p:eq(0)').replace(/.*(观看小说:|简介：)|各位书友.*/,'').replace(/\s+/g,'\n'),

      cover: og('image').replace('s:',':'),

      url: og('novel:read_url').replace('m.','www.'),
};

book;
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: name
ruleBookInfo.author: author
